edu.stanford.nlp.trees.tregex.gui

Class ScrollableTreeJPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.stanford.nlp.parser.ui.TreeJPanel
              • edu.stanford.nlp.trees.tregex.gui.ScrollableTreeJPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ScrollableTreeJPanel
extends TreeJPanel
    Component for displaying a tree in a JPanel that works correctly with scrolling.
    This panel also incorporates the text of the tree below the tree itself.
    Author:
    Anna Rafferty
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
